text: melum, avarkal tunkik kontiruntapotilum, nir avarkalai vilittuk kontiruppavarkalakave ennuvir; avarkalai nam valappuramum itappuramumaka purattukirom; tavira, avarkalutaiya nay tan iru munnankalkalaiyum vacarpatiyil virit(tup patut)tirukkiratu avarkalai nir urrupparttal, avarkalai vittum veruntu otip pinvankuvir; avarkalil ninrum untakum payattaik kontu nirampivituvir
